test-method.name: createAppointmentTest
test-method.description: Precondition: Create an appointment via the API 1. Send POST request to create a new appointment with provided data 2. Verify the response status code is 200 OK 3. Validate the response contains 'Status' as 'OK' 4. Retrieve and validate the Appointment ID from the response

test-method.name: searchPatientTest
test-method.description: Precondition: Patients and Doctor must be created successfully. 1. Send a GET request to fetch whether an appointment for the same time is created for the same doctor. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response indicates successful display of all the users that contain the string in their name.

test-method.name: BookingListTest
test-method.description: Precondition: Appointments must be made between current date and 5 days before the current date. 1. Send a GET request to fetch whether an appointment for the same time is created for the same doctor. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response indicates successfull display of appointments along with patient Id and Appointment time.

test-method.name: MainStoreTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to fetch Main Store from the Pharmacy Settings. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response has an Id corresponding to the store along with the name and store description.

test-method.name: PharmacyStoreTest
test-method.description: Precondition: Some Pharmacy Stores must be created already. 1. Send a GET request to fetch whether we are able to fetch the pharmacy stores or not. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response indicates successfull display of name of the store along with Store Id.

test-method.name: ActivatePharmacyCountTest
test-method.description: Pre-conditions: Will require the counter Id and counterName to enter as a qeury paramter in the API. 1. Send a PUT request to see whether we are able to activate the pharmacy counter. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response indicates successfull display of counter Id and counterName

test-method.name: DeactivatePharmCountTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a PUT request to fetch whether we are able to deactivate the pharmacy counter. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response indicates successfull display of status code as 200.

test-method.name: AppointApplicDeptTest
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to fetch a list of Appointment Applicable Departments. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response indicates successfull display of department name, department id, department code

test-method.name: AdmittedPatientsData
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to fetch a list of currently Admitted Patients Data. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response indicates successfull display of Patient Admission Id, Admitted Date but Discharged Date must be null

test-method.name: GetProfileDataByEmployeeId
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to fetch profile details. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Verify employee ID is not null. 3. Validate the response indicates successful display of account holder details.

test-method.name: addANewDepartment
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to add a new Department and fetch response details. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Verify Department code is not null. 3. Validate the response indicates successful display of department creation.

test-method.name: GetDepartments
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to get the list of departments. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Verify the department codes are unique.

test-method.name: EditDepartment
test-method.description: 1. Send a PUT request to edit the department details. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Validate the response indicates successful display of department details with changes being present in the response.

test-method.name: GetImagingTypes
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to get imaging types. 2. Verify the response status code is 200.

test-method.name: GetSignatoriesByDepartment
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to get signatories by department. 2. Verify the response status code is 200. 3. Verify that the EmployeeId, FirstName, LastName are not null from the response validating that the data is present.

test-method.name: cancelAppointmentTest
test-method.description: Precondition: An appointment must be created successfully. 1. Validate that the appointment ID is not null. 2. Send a PUT request to cancel the appointment using the appointment ID. 3. Verify the response status code is 200. 4. Validate the response indicates successful cancellation.
